column1: LG UNIVERSAL FIT / THROUGH THE WALL MODEL NUMBER SPECS & DETAILS

column2: Specifically engineered to fit standard 26" wall sleeves from nearly all major manufacturers, allowing for a seamless replacement process with zero structural modification.
Provides high-capacity cooling for tropical summers and supplemental heating for cooler mountain nights or high-humidity winter cycles.
Allows us to offer customers remote island-wide climate control and energy monitoring via their smartphones.
An industrial-grade protective shield applied to the condenser fins to prevent salt-air oxidation—a critical requirement for Oahu’s coastal micro-climates.
Integrated system checks that communicate directly with the ThinQ app for rapid troubleshooting and maintenance verification.
Automatically restores the cooling/heating cycle following island power surges or brief utility outages.
